description: This script configures wireless interfaces, restarts hostapd services, manages network bridges, configures DHCP and IP settings, manipulates firewall rules with ebtables, and starts essential network services such as dnsmasq and lighttpd. It performs network setup tasks for a router in bridge and wireless modes, primarily on a Linux-based embedded system.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service on the 2.4 GHz interface by bringing interfaces down and up and killing existing hostapd processes.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd_5G
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service for the 5 GHz interface by removing and reloading kernel modules.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service on the 2.4 GHz interface by killing existing processes and bringing interfaces up.
